headline: Jamie Dimon's Grip On US Credit Card Dominance Grows As JPMorgan Wins Apple Card Business From Goldman Sachs
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has chosen JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) as the new issuer of the Apple Card, ending Goldman Sachs' (NYSE:GS) role in a move that significantly reshapes the consumer finance ambitions of all three companies. JPMorgan Chase Takes Over Apple Card From Goldman Sachs On Wednesday, JPMorgan Chase announced that it has reached an agreement with Apple to become the new issuer of the Apple Card, replacing Goldman Sachs. The deal expands the largest U.S. bank's already massive credit

headline: Does Mastercard (MA) Share Price Reflect Its Earnings Multiple And Excess Returns Story?
summary: If you are wondering whether Mastercard’s current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are in the right place for a clear look at what the numbers actually say about value. The stock last closed at US$580.07, with returns of 1.6% over 7 days, 7.9% over 30 days, 3.0% year to date, 13.1% over 1 year, 55.4% over 3 years and 82.6% over 5 years. This gives useful context before comparing that price to different valuation estimates. Recent attention on Mastercard has been shaped by...

summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is one of the best major stocks to invest in right now.
